titles.title: A resolution honoring the Maine-Endwell Little League Team of Endwell, New York, for the victory of the team in the 2016 Little League World Series.
A resolution honoring the Maine-Endwell Little League Team of Endwell, New York, for the victory of the team in the 2016 Little League World Series.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Maine-Endwell Little League Team on winning the 70th Little League Baseball World Series championship.
